    • 自定义指令

    # Item

    # 基本用法

    alarm
    inner
    一些文本
        <sw-item :to="to">
      <sw-icon slot="before" name="alarm"></sw-icon>
      <div slot="after">一些文本</div>
      <div>inner</div>
    </sw-item>

    export default {
  data: ()=>({
    to:'icon.html'
  })
}

    # 参数

    Name Type Required
    to String|Object false https://router.vuejs.org/zh/guide/essentials/navigation.html

    # 插槽

    Name Required direction
    before false 置于default左侧的插槽
    after false 置于default右侧的插槽
    default false 置于中间的插槽
